entry.title: $2300 // Large, renovated 2 bedroom in heart of Crown Heights
entry.content:
Pre-war gut renovation - Huge bedrooms with closet and windows - Boxed living room separate from the kitchen. - Stainless steel kitchen appliances with lots of cabin space and large fridge - Huge amount of closets throughout - Elevator building - Heat and hot water included. No broker's fee!!!

Transit: 2/5 at President St or B/Q at Prospect Park

Amenities:
High Ceilings
Hardwood floors
Eat In Kitchen
Stainless Steel Appliances
Built in microwave
Granite countertops

entry.title: $2300 // NO FEE!! HUGE 1 bed in Prime Crown Heights!2/3/4/5 trains <3 min away
entry.content:
NO FEE!!!!!!

Beautiful spacious 1 bed apartment located in prime Crown Heights.
The huge apartment is located right on Carroll Street off of Franklin Avenue,
an amazing spot just steps to Prospect Park and the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens.

Tons of bars and restaurants nearby, and the 2/3/4/5 trains are less than 3 minutes from your doorstep!

Heat and hot water are included in the rent and there is no broker fee!

entry.title: $2625 // Luxury 2 bed, nearby transit & a POOL
entry.content:
Introducing 1247 Atlantic Avenue, a newly constructed luxury community centrally-located on the corner of Nostrand and Atlantic avenues.

Brand new, tastefully designed studios, one and two-bed units feature sun-filled floor-to-ceiling windows, designer finishes, and high ceilings. Island kitchen with stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher.

Some layouts feature private balconies. Unparalleled amenities including a roofdeck, rooftop gym, laundry, bike storage, courtyard, steamroom/sauna, AND SWIMMING POOL. No broker's fee!!!

Gross Rent: $3,400
6 weeks free, Net: $2,625


Transit: A/C at Nostrand (20 minutes to downtown Manhattan)

Amenities:
Central A/C
High Ceilings
Hardwood Floors
Video Intercom
Elevator
Natural Light in Living Area
Laundry in building
Outdoor Space
Common courtyard
Roof access
